title: Counter-Strike 1.6 BoomSide , Be aware the BoomSide
description:
History of the game =>

 Counter-Strike 1.6 is one of the best FPS game in the history , that game was 
 played by a lot of people and in nowadays is played , but not at the same level , 
 so I want to remake the game popularity and I present today a modification of the 
 original game , for you ! This game appeared in 1999 ( after Half-Life 1 release - 
 1998 ) , one year after that game was one of the most played . Half-Life hadn't 
 the same popularity as Counter-Strike 1.6 , but i saw so it's played and nowadays 
 by a lot of people . The majority of CS 1.6 players , moved to Counter-Strike : 
 Global Offensive cuz them said so that game is older and will not be played .

About this Game Pack =>

 In this version was updated the protection of the game and now , there is no way 
 to be modified your game files ! This client game kit is clean and you can choose 
 the server on which you want to play ! In this version , all settings are saved 
 and the nickname is saved too !


Please seed and share with your friends :)
Sharing you can help this amazing game to be played at the same level !

Thanks cuz you rode all there and you downloaded the game !
